task.summary: Test that a POST request completes without crashing the app.
Using composed matchers. Placing canned data to slime the test before implementing the actual behaviour.
Extracting 'posting expenses' logic into a helper method. Adding tests for getting an expense from out web service
Saving work in progress. Labeling specs as 'pending'.
Hooking the app to a web server.
Configured Rack::Test to be available by including it in spec_helper.
Returning expense id after HTTP request. Unit test driven by RACK::TEST
Testing for an OK response and DRYing the specs by moving the setup code to a before hook.
Testing the unhappy case of failing expenses registration
